description: Try our easy to follow Chilli Beef with Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Beef stir-fry,Low saturated fat,Egg free,Low sugar,Valentine's Day,Beef,Broccolini,Quick & easy dinner,Microwave,High protein,High fibre,Rice,Dairy free
name: Chilli Beef with Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 brown onion, cut into thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sauces, garlic and chilli in a bowl. Heat a wok over high heat. Add 1 tsp of oil and swirl to coat. Add half the steak and stir fry for 2 minutes or until browned. Transfer to a plate. Repeat with remaining steak.
Heat remaining oil. Add onion and stir fry for 2 minutes or until tender. Return beef to wok with sauce. Toss to combine and bring sauce to the boil.
Meanwhile, cook broccolini in boiling water for 2 minutes or until just tender. Drain. Serve reserved rice with beef and broccolini. Top with sliced spring onion and sliced chilli. Serve.
